message:
Shibir slams arrest of its men:

Govt. nabbing Shibir men with an aim to bar Student Movement- Chhatrashibir


Bangladesh Islami Chhatrashibir strongly slated and protested against arrest of its leaders and activists in districts of the country including Khulna, Kustia, Sunamgonj, Munsigonj etc.

In a protest statement, the Secretary-General of Bangladesh Islami Chhatrashibir Abdul Zabbar said, “The Awami government is desperately arresting Shibir men in various districts of the country with intent to bar the ongoing student movement and the attitude of the government that it counts the student movement as a vital bar to its blueprint to hang on power through a sham election has been exposed before the public thereby. We’d like to speak outspokenly that the ongoing movement of Chhatrashibir together with the student segment can in no way be deactivated. The Awami government must suffer a lot in near future if it, out of its nasty political envy, goes on with its dirty agenda of arresting our leaders and activists.”

He urged the government and the law enforcement agencies to shun undemocratic actions, refrain from arresting Shibir leaders as well as activists and stop filing false cases against them.
